frameset.edef: contrary to / incompatible with / alien / opposite to

role.argrole: a person who infringe or transgress or gainsay

example.parse: (S (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN مذكرة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التوقيف))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الدولية))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN مخالفة) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN لعرف) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الدولي)))))
